phrases.phrase: 공공 기관에 대한 관리 감독을 일원화하다
meanings: unify management and supervision over public organizations
Verb be unified, be merged, become one

examples.korean: But, with the rise of the public school system, it largely died until the 1960s when some parents who recoiled against a perceived one-size-fits-all approach in public schools began homeschooling their children. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러나 공립학교체제의 출현과 함께 공교육의 일원화에 주춤하던 일부 학부형들이 그들의 자녀들을 홈스쿨링하기 시작했던 1960년대까지 대부분이 소멸했었다. Neungyule
examples.english: But, with the rise of the public school system, it largely died until the 1960s when some parents who recoiled against a perceived one-size-fits-all approach in public schools began homeschooling their children. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: 2nd Statement: In North Korea, there are almost no small businesses because of strict governmental control and centralized trade. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 2차 진술: 북한에는, 엄격한 정부 통제와 일원화된 무역으로 인해 소기업들이 거의 없다. TIMES CORE
